front.title: Retrieving Specific Location from a Remote Entity using Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) Subscription Filters and Notifications

abstract.t: This document creates and describes the SIP subscription filters necessary to acquire the desired location information in the form ofa Presence Information Data Format - Location Object (PIDF-LO) from a remote SIP user agent (UA).The key words "MUST", "MUST NOT", "REQUIRED", "SHALL", "SHALL NOT","SHOULD", "SHOULD NOT", "RECOMMENDED", "MAY", and "OPTIONAL" in thisdocument are to be interpreted as described in RFC 2119 [RFC 2119].
